column677: C&P DevOps team is monitoring for any suspicious activity. Initial milestones: (30 days) - Meet with TM2 Development team to determine validity of finding. (60 days) - Create a plan to upgrade to a version that includes the necessary security patches (90 days) - Deployment of updates to production environment.
column679:
ProdOps will configure infrastructure monitoring, availability/up-time monitoring, and monitoring of connectivity with internal/external partners by default.

Provide details about additional metrics that are critical to validating the normal operation of the system, including any indirect metrics that may indicate a problem in the system or related systems.
Provide a list of all individuals that should be included on alerts or who should have access to monitoring tools.
Provide any SLAs that have been communicated to the business.

column677: C&P DevOps team is monitoring for any suspicious activity. Initial milestones: (30 days) - Meet with TM2 Development team to determine validity of finding. (60 days) - Create a plan to upgrade to a version that includes the necessary security patches (90 days) - Deployment of updates to production environment.
column679:
ProdOps will configure infrastructure monitoring, availability/up-time monitoring, and monitoring of connectivity with internal/external partners by default.

Provide details about additional metrics that are critical to validating the normal operation of the system, including any indirect metrics that may indicate a problem in the system or related systems.
Provide a list of all individuals that should be included on alerts or who should have access to monitoring tools.
Provide any SLAs that have been communicated to the business.

Provide a list of all individuals that should be included on alerts or who should have access to monitoring tools.
Provide any SLAs that have been communicated to the business.
